education_text.0: He attended high school at the      University of Toronto Schools University of Toronto Schools, graduating in 1991He attended high school at the      University of Toronto Schools University of Toronto Schools, graduating in 1991As a high school student, Goldberg was a member of Canada's team to the      International Mathematical Olympiad International Math Olympiad from 1989 to 1991, where he received a bronze, silver, and gold medal respectivelyAs a high school student, Goldberg was a member of Canada's team to the      International Mathematical Olympiad International Math Olympiad from 1989 to 1991, where he received a bronze, silver, and gold medal respectively Vitalik Buterin Vitalik Buterin, founder of      Ethereum, was a research assistant of Goldberg while a student at the      University of Waterloo University of Waterloo Vitalik Buterin Vitalik Buterin, founder of      Ethereum, was a research assistant of Goldberg while a student at the      University of Waterloo University of Waterloo Vitalik Buterin Vitalik Buterin, founder of      Ethereum, was a research assistant of Goldberg while a student at the      University of Waterloo University of Waterloo
